attributes.action: Creat a Windfall Tax on Bankers profits and Bonuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the support given by central government to the banking sector we say that a windfall tax be introduced to tax profits made by the Banking sector and the bonuses paid to individuals. This would be a one off windfall tax initially but again be exercised in following years if restraint and caution fails to be exercised in the sector.
